EnhancementTree.Name: U51 Grandmaster of Flowers

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Inner Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain proficiency with Handwraps, and are able to generate Ki if you did not already have that ability. Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following: +10 Melee Power, +6 Ranged Power, and +25 Maximum Ki.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Material
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Material Type. Your weapons bypass the chosen material type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Adamantine
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Adamantine DR type.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Byeshk
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Byeshk DR type.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cold Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Cold Iron DR type.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crystal
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Crystal DR type.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silver
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Silver DR type.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Morality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Alignment. Your weapons bypass the chosen alignment. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Magical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Chaotic
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Chaotic DR type.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Evil DR type.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Good
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Good DR type.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lawful
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Lawful DR type.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Strike with Poise
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Stunning DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Serenity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle: You may now fight with the Unarmed combat style as if you were a Monk. When you attack with Handwraps or begin falling, you will use the Monk class' animations instead of your own. You gain a +10% Action Boost bonus to movement speed, and no longer take damage from falling.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple's Studies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal, Intimidate, and Bluff. +[3/6/9] Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Builders
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bring into Focus
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Builder Focus inwards to gain 2d6 Ki and one Martial Charge. You also gain +5 Spell Resistance, with an additional +1 for each point of Passive Ki Regeneration you have for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lily Petal
EnhancementSelection.Description: Martial Builder Fire a bolt of pure Ki outwards, dealing 1d6+6 Force damage per character level, scaling with Force spellpower. The force damage is doubled versus Tainted Creatures (Undead, Abberations, Evil Outsiders). Attempts to Stun for 2 seconds, DC 20 + highest ability modifier + Stunning bonuses. Grants 5 Ki and a Martial Charge when activated. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Enlightenment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[15/30/45] Maximum Ki and +[2/4/6] Concentration. Rank 3: +1 passive Ki Generation.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Calm before Storms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Spell Resistance. Each Martial Charge now grants +1 to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementTree.EnhancementTreeItem:
U51GrandmasterOfFlowersSpenders Grandmaster of Flowers: Spenders
1 2 1 1 5 >
20
Drifting Lotus Martial Spender: Melee Cleave Attack: +[3/4/5][W], +[1/2/3] Critical Threat and Multiplier. Deals 1d6+5 Force damage per character level to all enemies struck. This force damage is doubled versus Tainted Creatures (Evil Outsiders + any Favored Enemies you may have). If 3+ Martial Charges are consumed, this also attempts to stun all enemies struck for 6 seconds, DC (20 + highest ability score modifier + stunning bonuses). Activation Cost: 30 Ki. Cooldown: 25 seconds.
1
Ki Projection Martial Spender: Channel pure Ki into yourself, and then project it forward with your attacks. For 10 seconds, your basic attacks are replaced by pure Ki Projections that deal 1d6+6 Force damage per Character Level. The duration of this ability is increased by 3/4/5 seconds for each Martial Charge consumed. If 3 or more Martial Charges are consumed, you will release a blast of pure Ki when you activate this ability, dealing 1d6+5 Force damage to all enemies nearby and attempting to Stun all enemies struck for 6 seconds, DC (20 + highest ability score modifier + stunning bonuses). Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 25 seconds.
1
Orchid Blossom Martial Spender: A blossom is released from your palm in a line, exploding when it makes contact, dealing 1d6+5 Force damage per character level scaling with Force Spellpower to all enemies within. The force damage is double versus Tainted Creatures (Undead, Abberations, Evil Outsiders). If 3+ Martial Charges are consumed, also attempts to Stun all enemies struck, DC (20 + highest Ability Score modifier + stunning bonuses). Stun lasts 2 seconds. Grants 25 Ki when used. Cooldown: 25 seconds.
1

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Meditate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Meditation feat. +[1/2/3] Meditate charges. Meditation now recharges at a rate of 1 per [180/150/120] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Wholeness of Spirit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may expend a meditate charge to bring your mind, body, and soul into harmonious balance, restoring health as if you were affected by the benefits of a Heal spell, as well as curing all ability damage, negative levels, and other Adverse Conditions that may be affecting you. Cooldown: [3/2/1] minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Hail of Blows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5% Offhand Strike chance, +3% doublestrike and doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Strength of Stone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Maximum Hitpoints, +[2/4/6] Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Flickering Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to hit and damage. Rank 3: On hit, and upon being missed, you have a 10% chance to gain a Martial Charge. This may only happen once every 10 seconds, but can trigger independently, and these track their cooldowns separately.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Dance of Flowers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in the Grandmaster Destiny Mantle, your weapons gain +1[W].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Lotus Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a feat to gain access to without meeting its prerequisites.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Long Sword
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the effects of the Whirling Steel Strike feat, and may use Longswords as if they were Ki weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Deflection
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the Deflect Arrows feat, letting you knock aside one projectile every 6 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Longbow
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the effects of the Zen Archery feat, and may use Longbows as if they were Ki weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sickle
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the effects of the Prescient Curve feat, and may use Sickles as if they were Ki weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Balance in All Things
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While centered, you may tumble through enemies, and are immune to slippery surfaces and most forms of knockdown. +1 Martial Charge cap

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Flow of Water
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Saving Throws, you take [5/10/15]% less damage while Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Piercing Clarity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks bypass [5/10/15]% of enemy Fortification. Rank 2: Your attacks have Ghost Touch. Rank 3: You have True Seeing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Chase Perfection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a form of perfection

EnhancementSelection.Name: Perfection of Body
EnhancementSelection.Description: You no longer fail Fortitude saves automatically on a natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Perfection of Mind
EnhancementSelection.Description: You no longer fail Will saves automatically on a natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Perfection of Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: You no longer fail Reflex saves automatically on a natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Catch the Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3]% Dodge chance and +[2/4/6] Max Dex bonus with all armor. Rank 3: You gain the Slippery Mind feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Serene Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in the Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle, you deal +[5/10/15]% bonus damage to the Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Beyond the Center
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Magical Resistance Rating Cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Imposing Force
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While centered, when rolling a 19 or 20 on an attack, your critical multiplier is increased by +1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Scattering of Petals
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Initial Ki Cost: 30. Reduces your Ki Regen by 50. You and nearby allies are covered by a swirling cloud of petals, granting you the effects of Petal Storm and debuffing your enemies with Disorienting Petals. This ends naturally after 1 minute or whenever you drop below 25 Ki. This storm moves with you and enemies and allies that enter or leave its effects will gain or lose its buffs or debuffs. Petal Storm buff: You have full Base Attack Bonus, deal 10% more weapon damage, and gain +10 Physical Resistance Rating and Armor Class. Disorienting Petals debuff: Enemies with this debuff become vulnerable to sneak attacks and lose 100% Fortification. Cooldown: 1 Minute.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Elude the Veil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the effects of the Elusive Target feat, and if you have it already, it instead has double the chance to occur. +3% dodge, +1% dodge cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Balanced Attacks
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Tactical DCs, +1 Passive Ki generation. Rank 3: While dual wielding, you gain: On Vorpal: Knock down an enemy for 2 seconds. Knocked down enemies are Helpless.
